title: Navigate forwards to a spin button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Day' spin button.

title: Navigate backwards to a spin button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Year' spin button.

title: Request information about a spin button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Day' spin button, read information about the button.

title: Decrement a spin button by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'eighteenth'.

title: Increment a spin button by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'twentieth'.

title: Decrement a spin button by five steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'fourteenth'.

title: Increment a spin button by five steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'twenty fourth'.

title: Decrement a spin button to the minimum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'first'.

title: Increment a spin button to the maximum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'thirty first'.
